title: Investor Intelligence Starter Kit
subtitle: Get started with AI-powered investment research
description: A free starter pack with 5 Claude Code prompts for stock screening, a basic Notion deal tracker template, and a PDF guide to AI-powered investment research workflows.
highlights: 5 Claude Code prompts for stock screening
PDF guide to AI investment research

title: Deal Flow CRM
subtitle: Notion template for VC and angel deal management
description: Pre-built Notion database with deal pipeline stages, LP relationship tracker, portfolio company dashboard, due diligence checklist templates, and meeting notes system. Built for VCs and angels managing 10-100+ deals.
highlights: LP relationship tracker with commitment history
Portfolio company dashboard with KPI tracking
Meeting notes linked to deals automatically

title: n8n Deal Sourcing Pipeline
subtitle: Automated deal discovery and filtering
description: An n8n workflow that monitors startup databases and RSS feeds, filters by your investment criteria (stage, sector, geography), and sends a daily digest with scored opportunities. Syncs automatically to Notion or Airtable.
highlights: Daily email digest with scored opportunities

title: Due Diligence Agent Pack
subtitle: 5 AI agents that produce a 15-page DD report
description: Five specialized AI agents that work together to analyze any company: Company Profiler, Financial Analyzer, Competitive Intelligence, Market Sizer, and Risk Assessor. Feed in a company name and get a comprehensive due diligence report. Includes Claude Code skills and n8n orchestration.
highlights: Company Profiler: team, traction, product analysis
Financial Analyzer: revenue model, burn rate, runway
Risk Assessor: red flags, regulatory, technical risk

title: LP Reporting Automation
subtitle: Automated quarterly LP reports with AI narratives
description: A complete system for automating quarterly LP reports. Data collection agents pull metrics from portfolio companies, aggregate performance data, generate AI-written narratives, produce formatted PDFs, and distribute via email. Built with Claude Code agents and n8n workflows.

title: Competitive Intelligence System
subtitle: Automated competitor tracking and weekly briefings
description: Three n8n workflows plus Claude analysis agents that monitor competitor activity, aggregate news and patent filings, and produce weekly competitive intelligence briefings. Includes a Notion dashboard for tracking competitor moves over time.
highlights: Claude AI analysis of competitive positioning

title: Investor Intelligence Platform
subtitle: Full-stack architecture for institutional intelligence
description: Complete system architecture blueprint for building an institutional-grade intelligence platform. Includes data ingestion pipelines (SEC filings, news, market data), vector database for semantic search across documents, multi-agent orchestration for research tasks, dashboard specifications, and Infrastructure-as-Code templates for deployment.
highlights: Data ingestion: SEC filings, news, market feeds
Vector DB for semantic document search
Deployment guides for OCI and AWS

title: Deal Flow Intelligence Engine
subtitle: 8 automated workflows from sourcing to decision
description: End-to-end automated deal sourcing system with 8 n8n workflows covering: source monitoring, initial screening, company enrichment, thesis matching, deal scoring, CRM synchronization, team notification, and weekly pipeline digest. The complete pipeline from discovery to investment committee.
highlights: Source monitoring across databases and networks
Company enrichment from multiple data sources
Team Slack notifications for high-score deals

title: Portfolio Tracker Vault
subtitle: Obsidian vault for personal investment tracking
description: A structured Obsidian vault with templates for quarterly portfolio reviews, company metric tracking, investment thesis journals, and performance logging. Designed for individual investors who want a private, offline-first system for tracking their portfolio and validating their theses over time.
highlights: Private, offline-first — your data stays local

title: Market Research Prompt Pack
subtitle: 20+ prompts for stock screening and sector analysis
description: A curated collection of 20+ Claude and GPT prompts specifically designed for investment research: competitive landscape analysis, TAM/SAM/SOM estimation, earnings call extraction, 10-K filing analysis, and sector mapping. Includes a Claude Code workspace configuration for seamless workflow.

title: Stock Research Agent
subtitle: Claude Code workspace for fundamental analysis
description: A pre-configured Claude Code workspace optimized for individual stock research. Includes skills for fundamental analysis, earnings comparison across quarters, sector mapping, and valuation modeling. Drop in a ticker symbol and get structured analysis.
highlights: Works with any publicly traded company

title: Market Sentiment Analyzer
subtitle: n8n workflow for news and social sentiment scoring
description: An n8n workflow paired with a Claude analysis agent that monitors financial news and social media for sentiment signals. Scores sentiment by ticker, sector, or custom watchlist, and triggers alerts when sentiment shifts significantly. Includes daily digest and historical tracking.
highlights: Real-time news and social sentiment monitoring
Significant shift alerts via email or Slack

title: Investor Research Workspace
subtitle: Complete Claude Code + Coworker setup for research
description: A fully configured workspace for Claude Code and Anthropic Coworker, pre-loaded with 30+ investment research prompts, research methodology templates, source validation workflows, and custom skills for financial analysis. The all-in-one environment for AI-powered investment research.
highlights: Custom Claude Code skills for finance
Works for both institutional and individual investors

title: The Complete Investor AI Stack
subtitle: Everything bundled at 40% off
description: The ultimate bundle: every institutional product in one package. Includes Due Diligence Agent Pack, Competitive Intelligence System, Investor Intelligence Platform architecture, and LP Reporting Automation. All agents, workflows, architectures, and templates — shipped as one cohesive system.
highlights: One cohesive system, not separate tools
